summary: becky schoenig was shocked when her stolen car was located monday night , just a little over a month after she took the car home . then , on april 1 , schoenig was shocked to learn that police had found her car after receiving a tip from a man who recognized the vehicle as schoenig 's and would be returning it to her - but with a few minor changes . the sexton on wheels will feature banana , pineapple , peach and coconut cream .
aspect: 1. Missouri mom's stolen car returned with new red rims and detailing. 2. Schoenig thanks car thieves for customization and makes smoothie in honor of the finder. 3. Schoenig, known for her sense of humor, focuses on the positive despite the smell in her car.
explain: The car was stolen from Becky Schoenig in Missouri, but the car thieves returned her car to her with customized rims and details. Schoenig was thankful for the changes and even made a smoothie to thank the person who found her car. Despite the smell in her car, Schoenig chose to focus on the positive outcome of the situation.
